field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling.

field.name: icon_container_margin_top
field.label: Icon Container Top Margin
field.description: Which margin do you need? Example: -40px or 40px etc.

field.name: icon_titles
field.label: Icon Titles
field.description: Would you like to show titles?

field.name: icon_title_color
field.label: Icon Title Color
field.description: Which color should the icon titles have? If you leave the field empty the defined link color from your template is used. Must be valid: #ffffff or white etc

field.name: icon_title_fontsize
field.label: Icon Title Fontsize
field.description: Which fontsize should the icon titles have? If you leave the field empty the defined link size from your template is used. Must be valid: 12px etc

field.name: icon_orientation
field.label: Icon List Orientation
field.description: which way would you like the list to go?.
field.option: Vertical - icons to left of titles
Vertical - icons to right of titles

field.name: incCSS
field.label: Include CSS
field.description: Would you like to include the CSS file for this module.

field.name: icon_height
field.label: Icon Height
field.description: Enter the height of the icon without the unit eg: 40 instead of 40px

field.name: icon_width
field.label: Icon Width
field.description: Enter the width of the icon without the unit eg: 40 instead of 40px

field.name: icon1_status
field.label: Icon 1 Status
field.description: Registered+ this will only show the menu item to registered users and above.

field.name: icon1_img
field.label: Icon 1 Image
field.description: choose the icon you want to use

field.name: icon1_target
field.label: Icon 1 Target
field.description: Choose whether the icon click will open a new window/tab or not

field.name: icon1_title
field.label: Icon 1 Title
field.description: type in the title of your icon

field.name: icon1_link
field.label: Icon 1 URL
field.description: Enter the URL for this menu item. (Eg. http://ninjaforge.com )

field.name: icon1_alt
field.label: Icon 1 Alt
field.description: The Alt text for the icon image. This is important for accessibility and HTML validation.
